This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-20T15:57:29Z Paul Richardson 2015-02-20T15:47:13+00:00 2015-02-20T15:47:13+00:00 FW: Developing Leaders for a Digital Age Online Course https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;ca642aa1.1502 Hello all,<br><br>Please can you pass this onto any colleagues working in FE and Skills who may be interested in participating in this free online course. The course draws on Jisc work and in particular the emerging findings from the Jisc FE Digital Student project (http://digitalstudent.jiscinvolve.org/wp/fe-and-skills-digital-student-study/)<br><br>Best regards,<br><br>Sarah<br><br>*Developing Leaders for a Digital Age Online Course [...] Paul Richardson 2015-02-06T11:43:18+00:00 2015-02-06T11:43:18+00:00 OER15, Cardiff: Online registration available at early bird rates https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;aeea7377.1502 Dear Colleagues,<br><br>This is a reminder that registration is now open for OER15, the international conference on Open Educational Resources. The 'early bird' rate is available until February 16th. Our venue is the impressive Royal Welsh College of Music and Drama, Cardiff on 14-15 April 2015. Please register with us here: http://oer15.oerconf.org/. [...] Paul Richardson 2015-01-22T07:39:39+00:00 2015-01-22T07:39:39+00:00 FW: Webinar: How Open is Open Education? Removing barriers for all staff, students and other learners https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;33743f66.1501 For info. Apologies for cross-posting.<br><br>From: Open Education Special Interest Group [mailto:OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Terry Loane<br>Sent: 20 January 2015 21:46<br>To: OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<mailto:OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK><br>Subject: Webinar: How Open is Open Education? Removing barriers for all staff, students and other learners<br><br>The next free webinar promoted by the ALT Open Education Special Interest Group will take place on Thursday 29 January at 13.00. The subject is: [...] Agland J.D. 2014-12-19T13:42:57+00:00 2014-12-19T13:42:57+00:00 Jisc customer services division launches in 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;b818e6e1.1412 <https://c.na12.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015U00000028BRw&oid=00DU0000000IZ5Y><br><br>Dear Colleagues<br><br>We would like to draw your attention to the following message about how Jisc will deliver support to universities, colleges and skills providers in Wales, from January 2015. Further details, including new email addresses and phone numbers, will be sent out to this list early in the New Year, and will also appear on Jisc's website<http://www.jisc.ac.uk/>. [...] Kelly H. 2014-11-25T12:56:55+00:00 2014-11-25T12:56:55+00:00 Digital mapping service for colleges launches to support learners and teachers https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;fc3d5714.1411 Jisc Press Release<br><br>Having problems viewing this email? See our online<http://jisc.msgfocus.com/q/1126AMCnQBPKjorHT97/wv> version.<br><br>[Image removed by sender.]<br><br>News release<br>20 November 2014<br><br>Free digital mapping service for colleges launches to support FE sector and help students learn online<br>Today Ordnance Survey and Jisc<http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/15U8DdzVqjdkRpLlZTbb8> \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd the charity that offers digital services and solutions to UK education and research \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd are set to release Digimap for Colleges<http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/15U9auDQgG4XzFRYnZEUp>. The secure, free and easy to use online mapping service supports further education (FE) institutions and staff, and aids students in their studies. [...] Kelly H. 2014-11-19T14:25:57+00:00 2014-11-19T14:25:57+00:00 Jisc RSC Wales eBulletin November 2014 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;6f7d8acb.1411 Dear colleagues,<br><br>For list members who haven't received a personal copy of the Jisc RSC Wales Bulletin in their inbox, this is just to let everyone know that the November 2014 issue has been published with news, blog posts and events of interest to our customers in all sectors.<br><br>You can download the latest issue from our Moodle at http://bit.ly/JiscRSCWalesBulletin<br>Regards [...] Dacey A. 2014-11-07T15:49:51+00:00 2014-11-07T15:49:51+00:00 Invitation to Jisc FE Digital Student consultation events https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;41ce3db8.1411 Dear Colleague<br>We warmly invite you to take part in one of a series of national consultation events being run as part of our FE Digital Student project<http://bit.ly/FEDigitalstudent> from January to April 2015.<br>This Jisc project is exploring FE learners' expectations and experiences of technology and future work will expand the remit to the wider FE and Skills sector. [...] Dacey A. 2014-10-28T13:10:09+00:00 2014-10-28T13:10:09+00:00 App-based Learning https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;dc8b85e8.1410 Good afternoon<br><br>Here is a reminder about a piece of Jisc work currently underway.<br><br>Are you using app-based learning and are happy to share your experiences through a short video?<br><br>Jisc is currently updating its mobile learning resources and would like to invite proposals from learning and teaching staff in HE, FE and Skills for best practice videos around app-based learning. [...] Parcell E.J. 2014-10-13T13:54:52+00:00 2014-10-13T13:54:52+00:00 Free event: Making connections: exploring Open Educational Resources and Open Educational Practice in Wales https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;f4a9afd1.1410 Colleagues,<br><br>I\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdm forwarding this on behald of the OER Wales Cymru project. It\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds one of a series of free opportunities this term relating to open educational practice in Wales. Feel free to circulate to any interested staff in your networks.<br><br>Lis<br><br>Lis Parcell<br>Jisc RSC Wales<br><br>*****<br><br>Making connections: exploring Open Educational Resources and Open Educational Practice in Wales [...] Dacey A. 2014-10-08T15:31:18+00:00 2014-10-08T15:31:18+00:00 Message to Adult Community Education E-Learning Network from Jisc RSC Wales. https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;824c60c2.1410 Message to Adult Community Education E-Learning Network from Jisc RSC Wales.<br><br>You may be aware Jisc is currently undergoing a period of transition designed to streamline the organisation, reduce duplication and protect the quality and integrity of its services. We are now at the stage where the Customer Services Division is being reshaped. Pete Scott was appointed to the role of Director Jisc Group Customer Services in April this year and reports to Robert Haymon-Collins as Executive Director, Customer Experience. Robert has published a blog post that gives an overview of the "reshaping" exercise that can be found at: http://www.jisc.ac.uk/blog/towards-a-new-look-customer-service-function-for-jisc-01-jul-2014. [...] Kelly H. 2014-09-15T08:33:10+00:00 2014-09-15T08:33:10+00:00 Jisc RSC Wales - Launch of the new Hairdressing Training mobile App https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;47013ec2.1409 We are pleased to announce that today the popular Hairdressing Training service has a new mobile app.<br><br>[cid:image001.png@01CFD0C8.1B82FE80]<br><br>From today the existing portfolio of pioneering hairdressing and barbering training videos, from the award winning service - Hairdressing Training<http://www.hairdressing.ac.uk/>, developed by Mimas, a part of Jisc will be presented and accessible via an easy to use mobile app.<br>The app is the easiest way to access over 60 educational hairdressing and barbering video tutorials mapped to the NVQ curriculum - shared under creative commons licences. The videos have been created by those who teach NVQ/SVQ Levels 1-3 in further education in [...] Dacey A. 2014-07-30T14:29:39+00:00 2014-07-30T14:29:39+00:00 FW: Jisc Inform 40 launches today https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;4f423b79.1408 From: Elizabeth Somerville [mailto:inform@jisc.ac.uk]<br>Sent: 30 July 2014 11:29<br>To: Dacey A.<br>Subject: Jisc Inform 40 launches today<br><br>Jisc Inform 40 - 12 years covering digital, social and policy changes<br><br>Having problems viewing this email? See our online<http://jisc.msgfocus.com/q/1126AMA3hH9UgUHPkN7/wv> version.<br><br>[Jisc Inform 40]<http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/12MTpngbf8oVO6or4XPc2><br><br>[12 years covering digital, social and policy changes]<http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/12MTWEk65vgywmv3t4iVj><br><br>[http://jisc.msgfocus.com/files/amf_jisc/project_3/inform40_ft.png]<http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/12MUtVo0VS8beCBFRaMEA>Jisc Inform 40: 12 years of digital learning<http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/12MVytvQCBRqF8OUDnK78><br>In the 12 years since the first issue of Inform we\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdve seen plenty of developments in digital technologies...<http://jisc.msgfocus.com/c/12MW5KzLsYJ3noVx1udQp> [...] Barrett E. 2014-07-07T11:38:50+00:00 2014-07-07T11:38:50+00:00 Copyright & disability changes - free lunchtime webinar https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;34ac5171.1407 Jisc Techdis Free Webinar!<br>8 July 2014, 13:00-13:45, Online workshop, TechDis Tuesday<http://www.jisctechdis.ac.uk/techdis/events/detail/2014/tdtuesday08072014><br>Copyright changes - Join us and Jisc Legal for this 45 minute webinar on the new Copyright and Rights in Performances (Disability) Regulations 2014 which came into effect on 1 June 2014.<br><br>Betty Willder from Jisc Legal will lead this 45 minute session. These regulations extend the previous copyright law, which applied only to the visually impaired, to all disabled persons with an impairment which prevents them enjoying a copyright work to the same extent as someone without the impairment. details of which, including the booking links, can be found below.<br>All of these workshops are FREE to attend.<br>If you have any queries, please do not hesitate to get in touch.<br>Tuesday 13th May at Aberystwyth University<br>Managing Successful Projects in the Education Sector [...] Kelly H. 2014-04-17T09:15:02+00:00 2014-04-17T09:15:02+00:00 Jisc RSC Wales Easter Bulletin 2014 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACL-ELEARNING-WALES;9da80548.1404 For those list members who haven't received a personal copy in their inbox via our CRM system, this is just to let everyone know that the Jisc RSC Wales Easter 2014 Bulletin came out this week, packed with news, views and events (including our HE Forum on 7th May ) which is of interest to our customers in all sectors.
